text:
Dependence on very old sklearn versions (<= 0.10) necessitates very heavy backports.

I find my self having to backport stuff like: LinearyClassifierMixin, LinearRegressorMixin, LabelBinarizer, roc_aux_score, _alpha_grid, etc.

The backports are getting quite heavy. This is a problem, and we should only support reasonably new sklearn versions.
title: Dep on very old sklearn versions (<= 0.10) necessitates very heavy backports

text: I think that the policy is "this should work on Ubuntu 12.04". As this version is shipped with sklearn 0.10, I think that it's OK to drop all version below.
